title: Is anyone still having Authentification Problems?
body: Done everything except reinstall league. Just want to know if I'm the only one.

replies.body: Getting stuck at login indicates a possible network issue failing to reach our authentication server.  A reinstall wouldn't really resolve this.  Instead, run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot whatever is blocking you from getting through.  Let me know if you have any questions!

If the guide wasn't able to help, our tech team can dig deeper with you through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well to get some logs, and attach it to your ticket.  We'll take a look and get back to you as soon as we can!
